text: The Grammy Trustees Award is awarded by The Recording Academy to "individuals who, during their careers in music, technology, and so on have made significant contributions, other than performance, to the field of recording".Special Merit Awards: Class Of 2014 From 1983 onwards, performers could also receive this award.
